Desc.entry: Music and movement classes involving song and dance to enhance learning and communication skills, also lots of fun.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 10-10.45am ('Our Time' - music session for children aged 18 months-3 years), 1.30-2.15pm ('Village' - music sessions for children aged 0-18 months); Thurs 9.55-10.40am ('Village' - music sessions for children aged 0-18 months), 11-11.45am ('Our Time' - music session for children aged 18 months-3 years); Fri 9.30-10.15am('Village' - music sessions for children aged 0-18 months)
